statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM virtual_classroom;
SELECT student_id, student_email FROM virtual_classroom WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM virtual_classroom ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email, course_id, course_name FROM virtual_classroom WHERE course_id = 1 ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom WHERE course_id = 1 AND student_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT MAX(course_id) AS max_course_id, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM virtual_classroom
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM virtual_classroom WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY course_name
SELECT student_id, student_email FROM virtual_classroom WHERE course_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY student_id
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE course_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY instructor DESC;
SELECT student_id, email FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN student_courses ON students.student_id = student_courses.student_id JOIN courses ON student_courses.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN student_courses ON students.student_id = student_courses.student_id JOIN courses ON student_courses.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(course_id) AS num_courses FROM students JOIN student_courses ON students.student_id = student_courses.student_id GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (SELECT course_id FROM student_courses WHERE student_id = 2);
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses;
SELECT student_id, student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM registrations ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, student_name, email FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT * FROM registrations JOIN students ON registrations.student_id = students.student_id JOIN courses ON registrations.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE date_of_birth > '2000-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students INNER JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id;
SELECT classroom_id, campus, capacity FROM classrooms WHERE campus = 'Main Campus';
SELECT * FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id;
SELECT student_name, email, course_name FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT course_name, course_description, instructor_name FROM courses JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT classroom_location, campus, capacity FROM classrooms;
